name: Catatonic
description:
Catatonic is a 2-Player Catapult Basketball game.

(Game Pads Recommended)

Fallback keyboard controls are:

Player 1

Move: A, D

Jump: V

Shoot: B

Player 2

Move: Left/Right Arrows

Jump: ,

Shoot: .

Hold down the shoot button to launch further. Jump off the ground, the walls, and your friend!

View on LD36: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=87426
